reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Out our window was the sea. If one had time, the spa sang a siren's song, and the quiet ladies of the convent smiled and offered assistance when we met in the elevator. In addition to a great location, we had a tasty breakfast, and nighttime wine on the rooftop, from which the lights of Syracusa winked. We were close to the Ancient Greek Temples and Italian designer clothing boutiques. In a word. We had it all.
reviews.title: The Convent, Spa, Hotel Experience in Ortygia

reviews.text: The room I stayed in had a sea view and was elegantly furnished.
reviews.title: Beautiful room and very pleasant staff

reviews.text: Free bikes were available on request and very much added to the pleasure of my trip. Breakfast was ample and varied.
reviews.title: Excellent in all respects; location, views, breakfast
Peace and tranquility
reviews.text: The staff were attentive and helpful without being intrusive.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms were large and well appointed, Bathroom was larger than most and the location is terrific, right near the water. We used the parking facilities provided and walked everywhere we went, even to the Ruins. Spent almost all of our two days on the island so the car park was important.
reviews.title: Beautiful place
